title: Switch from Pixel to Pixel / Difference between Data Transfer Tool and Google Account Backup/Restore
content:
Hi all,

My question is, what is the difference between using the Data Transfer Tool and using Google's Backup/Restore Account method when setting up a new phone. 

In my private case the transfer is from Pixel 1 to Pixel 2. Do the two methods yield the exact same result, or are there nuances? 

To elaborate little further, what I'm interested in, is a as complete clone as possible of my old phone. Including app settings if possible. Also, would RCS/MMS messages transfer intact using the above two methods? For example, when doing the same process on a PC, there are very common and simple software solutions that clone the hard drive exactly, 1:1.

Thank you in advance!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
